content:
Made a PR for the new defaults in x.py: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/pull/813

I did it a little last-minute, the rust-lang/rust PR has already been approved :innocent: so it should probably land fairly soon so we're not too out of sync with x.py.
oh ... I just realized the guide needs to be updated for https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/73265 as well
I assume #73265 will be r+'d soon if CI is happy? so, let's wait for merging rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide#813 before renaming to avoid conflicts
yeah I'm just waiting for the check to finish before I add r+ again
